author: {'steamid': '76561198016845056', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1575646148}
review: Худшая из трех частей этой серии. Самое главное тут сломан стелс, одна из фишек игры и это все рушит, 3 и 10 миссии ужасны из-за этого. Но вот миссии с бегом на время отлично сделаны, вообще лучше бы они сделали из этой мини серии "ранеры" чем такой гибрид не понятно чего. Из плюсов тут еще самая красивая картинка в этой мини серии. А из минусов просчеты геймдизайна из-за которых многие миссии превращаются в мучение из-за неверных таймингов. Покупать не советую, только если по скидке на распрадаже.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092204774', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 451, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1577116097}
review: So I played the game for a while and after some time you get to (SPOILER) Afghanistan where you are supposed to fuck up some towers. All works fine until I get to the second tower, where after some really shity enemy placement, I am supposed to throw a knife at something to get back up and not be blown to pieces by the explosives I just set off. Now the problem is that you can only carry 2 knives and the game wants you to destroy 3 lamps before going to the explosives. You destroy the lamps by throwing knives at them. Since I can only carry 2 I had none left when I was down at the elevator, which meant that I could not advance the sequence and was forced to every 20 seconds over and over again. Fine, you think, just load the last checkpoint and it will be fine. Yeah, I thought the same thing, BUT GUESS WHAT? THE CHECKPOINT IS INSIDE THE FUCKING TOWER WHERE I SPAWN WITH NO FUCKING KNIVES! AND THERE IS NO WAY OF GETTING ANY! I am not going to replay 4 levels and sacrifice another 2-3 hours for a game, made by a AAA company, which softlocks you for playing AS WAS INTENDED! god I fucking hate this shit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198997823306', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1575515734}

author: {'steamid': '76561198212252748', 'num_games_owned': 112, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 419, 'last_played': 1546969513}
review:
[h1]Alguns acertos, ainda na média[/h1]

[i]Assassin’s Creed Chronicles: India[/i] faz parte de um conjunto de jogos intitulados [i]Assassin’s Creed Chronicles[/i], e trazem uma nova perspectiva para o jogador; dessa vez, o jogo é em 2.5D, com jogabilidade lateral e gráficos tridimensionais.

Com um sistema de luta simples, mas ao mesmo tempo desafiador de se masterizar, quebra-cabeças simples, mas não preguiçosos, e um sistema de furtividade que recompensa o jogador por esse estilo, [i]Assassin’s Creed Chronicles: India[/i] acaba sendo uma boa adição à sua coleção. É um jogo principalmente furtivo que faz o jogador pensar na melhor abordagem para cada momento. Novas adições em mecânicas de gameplay são muito bem vindas, como uma arma que ricocheteia pelas paredes para alcançar alvos em posições mais complicadas.

A ambientação histórica, dessa vez na Índia do século XIX, é como sempre muito bem feita. Personagens no fundo não falam inglês, embora a Índia fosse território britânico nessa época(isso também é de certa forma mostrado no jogo). O cenário deste jogo é mais vivo que o de seu antecessor, [i]Assassin’s Creed Chronicles: China[/i], mas ainda não o suficiente para causar um impacto. 

Há toda uma trama sobre a Companhia Britânica das Índias Ocidentais estarem em guerra com o Império Sikh, como os templários e os assassinos se envolvem no conflito e ainda o roubo de artefatos históricos, mas ela acaba ficando em segundo plano.



NOTA FINAL: 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198380343026', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 3454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1869, 'last_played': 1695926678}
review:
어크 크로니클 시리즈는 기존의 본편 어크에 비해 잠입암살에 특화된 게임입니다.
비슷한 게임으로는 마크오브더닌자가 있는데 어크보다 잠입에 중점을 둬서 잠입암살게임으로 좋게 평가받는가반면,
어크 크로니클은 잠입보다 전투가 쉬운(유니티 제외) 본편 어크와 다르게 외전격 2.5d에 잠입을 중점으로 만들었는데
본편 전작보다 무쌍이 어렵다는 이유로 낮게 평가를 받았습니다. 
스토리도 단순하다는 평도 있고 키보드마우스 조작감이 답답하다는 평도 있고..
(키보드 키설정 바꾸면서 했는데 개인적으론 조작감은 스피디하고 괜찮았음)
본편어크가 잠입보다 전투가 쉬워서 들키면 무쌍찍으니깐 어쌔신이 아니라 "워리어"크리드냐며 몇몇 유저들한테 까이는데,
(오리진 이전작들 완전동기화 깨다보면 몇몇 잠입미션은 잠입암살게임이 됨)
크로니클은 주인공이 약해서 무쌍이 어렵고 잠입위주로 답답하게 만들어서 진짜"어쌔신"크리드로 만들었냐며 몇몇 유저들한테 까입니다.(크로니클 시리즈도 전투 컨트롤에 익숙해지면 충분히 무쌍찍을수 있음)
본편 어크라 생각하고 플레이하다간 답답할수 있으니 어크타이틀을 빼고 다른 잠입암살게임한다고 생각하면 편할겁니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198166554660', 'num_games_owned': 393, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 728, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 728, 'last_played': 1570139722}
review:
Я не фанат платформеров (ну десяток всего прошел, мелочи короче). На мой взгляд эта часть - самая сложная из всей предыдущей серии ассассинов. Несколько раз думал "ну всё, надо удалять, это я не пройду. Вполне на некоторые места попыток тридцать сделать. Ну и по-прежнему клавиатура это не совсем удобно для игры.
По поводу сложностей: по сравнению с первой частью (китай) сильно увеличилось необходимое количество очков для бонусов (второй бонус для меня почти нереальность, в уровнях с бегом это золотая медаль, например). Стрелки, особенно один, представляет собой буквально пулемёт, ни сбежать, ни дымовой шашкой не спастись, ни убить.
появились враги, которых нельзя убить скрытно, ребят, это вообще та серия игр, или я куда-то не туда попал? Ну зато тамплиеры ассассинить стали. Ах да, как в другом обзоре заметили, убийства теперь сильно шумят. ну по крайней мере, у меня. может бонусов не добрал. Места где надо бежать от чего-то разрушающего в конце буквально наступают тебе на пятки, и вообще, на всём пути нельзя ни одной ошибки сделать, в китае близким по сложности был по-моему только финальный отрезок пути в конце игры, да и то там ошибки прощались.
Кстати хеликс в этой части читерский, но тоже не без минусов.
Короче, кто не боится трудностей - вполне может покупать. графика и звуки всё так же хороши, сам платформер тоже. Остальным же - ребята, поберегите нервы и компьютер, который вы в окно выбросите во время попыток прохождения. Не стоит игра того

author: {'steamid': '76561198112797338', 'num_games_owned': 640, 'num_reviews': 276, 'playtime_forever': 618, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 618, 'last_played': 1559233264}
review:
Pierwsza część spin-offa serii „Assassin’s Creed” — „Assassin’s Creed Chronicles” — przeniosła nas do XVI-wiecznych Chin tuż przy początku upadku dynastii Ming, gdzie jako Shao Jun poszukiwaliśmy puzdra Prekursorów. Druga część kontynuuje pościg za potężnym artefaktem, jednak przenosi nas z 1526 roku do 1839 roku do Indii. W dodatku zmienia się główny bohater, który jest ojcem Henry’ego Greena — asasyna znanego z „Assassin’s Creed: Syndicate”.

[h1] FABUŁA [/h1]
[i]Śpijcie spokojnie, zestawienie bez większych spoilerów![/i]
Arbaaz Mir jest młodym asasynem, któremu powierzono misję odzyskania cennego klejnotu skradzionego przez templariuszy. Jakby tego było mało, narasta napięcie między imperium Sikhów a Kompanią Wschodnioindyjską. Mężczyźnie niezbyt śpieszy się do walki, która toczy się wszędzie wokół niego, gdyż najważniejsza dla niego jest kobieta, która skradła mu serce. Mimo wszystko Arbaaz zamierza wypełnić swój obowiązek wobec bractwa i odzyskać klejnot Koh-i-Noor.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1756136142
Tak samo, jak w pierwszej części kronik, fabuła jest dobra, ale nie wciąga jakoś bardzo. Stanowi jedynie tło gry, w której mechanika gra pierwsze skrzypce. W scenariuszu zabrakło nieoczekiwanych zwrotów akcji i oryginalnych pomysłów, przez co historia nieuchronnie gna przed siebie, nie prezentując nic ciekawego.

[h1] MECHANIKA/ROZGRYWKA [/h1]
Całe sterowanie w [b]Assassin’s Creed Chronicles: India[/b], tak samo, jak w poprzedniej części, opiera się na klawiaturze i myszy, jednak jest to tak niedopracowane, że wygodniejszy staje się kontroler. Dalej mamy do czynienia z grafiką 2,5-wymiarową, w której lokacje są wielopoziomowe, a i same te poziomy zezwalają na ograniczony ruch wszerz. Tak samo dalej, większych różnic względem głównej serii próżno szukać, gdyż znajdziemy tutaj wszystko: parkour, wspinanie się po ścianach, skrytobójstwa, skoki wiary, orli wzrok czy misje.

Rozgrywka została podzielona na dziesięć sekwencji — na każdą podpada jedna misja główna, która tym razem potrafi się zmienić w trakcie rozgrywki. Z początku może kazać nam kogoś zabić, ale owe zabójstwo nie będzie wcale końcem sekwencji, tylko jej pierwszym etapem. Jako urozmaicenie rozgrywki, deweloper znowu wcisnął kilka misji pobocznych, które nie są nadzwyczaj skomplikowane, ale ich najskuteczniejsze wykonanie zapewnia więcej punktów. Nie zabrakło również przedmiotów kolekcjonerskich, „pozwalających” na dokładniejszą eksplorację lokacji — fragmentów Animusa oraz skrzyń zawierających najróżniejsze dokumenty rozszerzające lore świata. Nie obeszło się jednak bez zagrożenia, którym tutaj są… przeciwnicy.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1756134283
Pierwsza część „Assassin’s Creed Chronicles” była trudna, gdyż punktowała przemyślane i ciche działanie. [b]Assassin’s Creed Chronicles: India[/b] dość znacznie podwyższa poziom trudności, który już w Chinach był wysoki. Nasi przeciwnicy, chociaż widzą świat tylko w 2,5-wymiarze, patrolują okolice i rozglądają się według własnego schematu. Co prawda mają ograniczone pole widzenia — co gra nam dokładnie pokazuje — ale lubią raz na jakiś czas wyrwać się z monotonnego życia i — tutaj nowość — potrafią za pomocą drzwi przejść z jednego do drugiego poziomu. Rodzajów przeciwników jest więcej, każdy z nich cechuje się różnymi zdolnościami, skutecznie utrudniającymi nam rozgrywkę. My natomiast jako Arbaaz, podobnie jak w przypadku Shado, mamy do dyspozycji ostry miecz i petardy hukowe, natomiast nożyki do rzucania zostały zastąpione chakramami, które odbijają się od ścian. Indyjski asasyn nie musi zabijać przeciwników, gdyż może ich po prostu ogłuszyć, a następnie zabrać od nich amunicje, której to sloty w naszym ekwipunku są dość ograniczone. Z postępem w fabule zyskujemy również dostęp do mocy Helixa, która pozwala Arbaazowi wtapiać się w otoczenie i niespostrzeżenie przemykać między osłonami.

Dodatkową zmianą jest dostęp do pokoju wyzwań, które pozwala nam pobawić się mechaniką trochę dłużej — a to w zbieraniu elementów na czas, w mknięciu przed siebie, czy w zabijaniu. Dostępne są po dwa wyzwania na każdy z tych trzech typów.

[h1] OPRAWA GRAFICZNA [/h1]
Jak już wspomniałem, serię „Assassin’s Creed Chronicles” wyróżnia 2,5-wymiar i choćby mogło się wydawać, że będziemy biegać od jednej strony ekranu do drugiej, tak twórcy postanowili zainwestować trochę grosiwa i stworzyć płynne przejścia pozwalające poruszać się w głąb ekranu. Hasło „żyjące obrazy” nie jest tylko chwytem marketingowym i rzeczywiście mamy do czynienia z przerywnikami fabularnymi w postaci rysowanych plansz. Tym razem jednak, zamiast akwarelowych obrazów możemy podziwiać orientalne motywy, które są bardziej kolorowe i zróżnicowane. Poprawiono też krawędzie modeli, które w poprzedniej części nawet na najwyższych ustawieniach były postrzępione.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1756133405
[h1] UDŹWIĘKOWIENIE/MUZYKA [/h1]
Naszej rozgrywce towarzyszą klimatyczne utwory, wśród których możemy szukać znanych nam już kawałków — chociażby „Infiltration” od Shagatu Paper Band. Głosu Arbaaz Mirowi nie użyczyła wielka gwiazda, tylko mniej znany aktor — Johnny Neal. Tym razem obyło się również bez porażek ze strony dźwiękowców, którzy przyłożyli się do swojej pracy.

[h1] PODSUMOWANIE [/h1]
Po [b]Assassin’s Creed Chronicles: India[/b] spodziewałem się tego samego, co po części w Chinach. Twórcy jednak podeszli do tematu rozsądnie i pozbyli się błędów, które zaoferowali nam przy pierwszym podejściu, a także wzbogacili rozgrywkę o kilka znaczących ulepszeń. Niestety wraz z tym produkcja stała się grą bardzo trudną, w której metodą prób i błędów trzeba uczyć się, jak przejść dany etap sekwencji. Nie jest to złe, bo mimo wszystko [b]Assassin’s Creed Chronicles: India[/b] jest kawałkiem dobrej roboty, ale bez nerwów się nie obejdzie. Wymaga to więc cierpliwości, której raczej miłośnikom skradanek nie powinno brakować.

Ważne jest też, aby [b]Assassin’s Creed Chronicles: India[/b] nie traktować jako osobnej gry, gdyż ta dopiero z częścią w Chinach i Rosji tworzy pełną, bogatą i wartą uwagi historię.
[quote=Szynka013]Jeżeli moja recenzja pomogła Ci przy podjęciu decyzji nad zakupem, będę wdzięczny, jeśli zaobserwujesz moją [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33046115-Fridge-Friends/]stronę kuratora Steam[/url], co na pewno zmotywuje mnie do dalszej pracy.[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198258523364', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 596, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1605708964}
review:
Assassin's Creed India is quite a hard game. Especially if you don't know the controls at first. I played half of the game not knowing some controls. I had to look up a guide, which showed me that it's not that hard. You use a GRAPPLING HOOK. Wow I did not know that... So the game could've made it clearer which options you have. Also the graphics are amazing and the game isn't that demanding. I could play it with max settings and a solid 60 fps. It didn't drop below that once.

The story is fine. It's not too deep or lengthy. The characters are quite shallow, which is expected. The thing that bothered me the most is that the enemies have the same voice lines and dialogues with each other. It didn't feel very immersive when you hear for the 5th time in a row that the guards' "salaries are nothing to write home about". 

The game looks like a painting. The colours are warm and the shapes are smooth. It really is a beautiful game.

Anyways the gameplay was great but some of the stages were extremely frustrating and I rage quited a few times. :D
The timed missions were fine although some people say they're too hard. I think they are fine. Best part is the parkour and the killing. You have many different tools in your arsenal. 

Assassin's Creed Chronicles: India is a great game, but it's a shame Ubisoft wasted this fantastic location for a Chronicles game. They could've used India as location for a full Assassin's Creed game. Imagine that.

Ratings:

Gameplay - 9,5
Graphics 9
World / Locations 8
Story 6

author: {'steamid': '76561198045301435', 'num_games_owned': 2017, 'num_reviews': 697, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1563637066}
review: This entry was easily the best of the AC:C series, but very early on I started running into the same game breaking bugs that I had found in the other two entries. Getting stuck in areas that are literally impossible to escape, puzzles that don't recognize your movements, etc. The games are great for the lore of the AC world, but the problem is that they are just too buggy to play without just wasting a lot of time. Overall, I'm giving this one a 4/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198329523184', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 606, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 605, 'last_played': 1560579177}
review:
游戏总体玩起来算是不错的，游戏场景除了印度的圆顶建筑风景以外，同时有很大的篇幅在先行者遗迹中。游戏主角行事风格应该是盗贼这设定，最大的特色就是可以进行偷窃，并且游戏场景充满了很多陷阱机关。

游戏相对于前作中国来说，除了流程较短了一些以外，游戏的很多时间都用在主角跑酷上面，并且在跑酷中有各种的速度和时间的要求，增大了一些难度，但总体来说还是很简单（除非你是用键盘玩的）。

我认为游戏中有一些不太合理的设定：
1：有一些敌人无法进行暗杀，相当于敌人有了霸体一样，只有开helix攻击（同时按住Y+B）才可以杀掉，这样就有点不太合理，万一helix能量槽用光了，岂不是很尴尬，我觉得可以单独把helix攻击设置为一项技能，而不是成为暗杀的必要手段。也就是说允许敌人可以被多种方式暗杀掉，而不是被强制限制某一手段。
2：游戏中敌人的策略布置上，没有前作中国那么难，是非常简单的，很容易就可以达到鬼影金牌风格。

游戏中可以解锁的服装居然有4套，但是需要玩家达到刺客，鬼影，无声者风格才可以解锁，还是有点难度的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198056240219', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 362, 'last_played': 1560334405}
review:
В сравнении с первой частью трилогии Chronicles, посвященной Древнему Китаю, вторая часть получилась на порядок сложнее. Первая была в большей мере тактической и в большей мере стелс-игрой. Действительно было интересно пытаться пройти каждый участок уровня скрытно и без убийств. Во второй изменилась боевая система: в чем-то упростилась, в чем-то углубилась. Теперь парировать атаки противников проще, но также в игру введено много противников, выносящих героя на раз, хватает и тех, кого нельзя убить скрытно прыжком сверху или со спины, только после отвлечения. А еще здесь очень много уровней-"погонь" - когда вам надо бежать и вокруг все рушится, или следовать за кем-то и не потерять из виду (прямо как в "больших" Assassin's Creed), или избегать выстрелов из пулемета. Еще есть участки в отдельных уровнях, где нужно избегать ловушек в храме Предтечей, и пара "стрелковых" участков, где нужно бесшумно вынести ряд противников, точно в каком-нибудь Hitman: Sniper Challenge.

Игра продолжает общую историю Chronicles, из нее мы узнаем, зачем нужна шкатулка, показанная в China, но по-прежнему истории, отображаемые в Chronicles локальны, они рассказывают об отдельных ячейках Братства ассасинов, но на общую историю серии никак не влияют, кроме отсылок (фан-сервис). В этом плане China мне понравилась больше. Однако, если уже начинать играть в эту серию, то пройти необходимо все игры. Игру рекомендую к прохождению, но учтите, что нервов у вас она отберет куда больше.

Если Вам понравился мой обзор, то подпишитесь на мое [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/gerbus_games/curation]кураторство[/url] либо просто поставьте обзору "Да", буду очень Вам признателен!

author: {'steamid': '76561198288070555', 'num_games_owned': 875, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 495, 'last_played': 1557616245}
review:
Если покупать - то только в составе трилогии. И то, что бы пройти - не знаю даже ради чего ... Если у "China" и "Russia" есть хоть какая то видимая связь (спойлерить не буду) - то "India" существует просто что бы существовать, и от того пройдешь ты её или же нет - сюжет и общая картина никак не изменится.

В целом, всё тот же платформер что и  "China", с разницей лишь в том что очень скучные и однообразные уровни, сделанные под копирку. В Китае было хоть какое то разнообразие, а тут, всю игру пробираешься по какому то подземелью. И конечно же - бесконечные задания на время.

Прошёл игру без какого-либо интереса, только потому что я за неё заплатил... Псевдо-усложнение игры - ещё больше чем в Китае (особенно порадовал шум на пол района - от БЕСШУМНОГО убийства).
Да и сюжет, почему то мне напомнил "Prince of Persia: the sands of time"... Что говорит о том, что тем кто делал игру - было лень придумывать что то новое.

Ужасно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198819178413', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 425, 'last_played': 1562010861}
review:
Вторая часть трилогии Assassin’s Creed® Chronicles. И снова хорошо.
Игра достойна того, чтобы на нее обратили внимание. И равнодушным она никого не оставит.
Она яркая, цветаская, динамичная и не такая гнетущая, как Китай и Россия.
Игра с общей завязкой Prince of Persia восьмидесятых, но обыгранная миром и деталями Assassins creed.Нарисована игра очень красиво. Сюжет не из легких.Интересный геймплей завязанный на стелсе и реакции, красивый визуальный ряд, все это и есть Assassin’s Creed® Chronicles: India.
Кто не играл - берите и не пожалеете. всё же фраза "Отличное 2D лучше кривого 3D" всё ещё актуальна и это радует. Ассасинам очень идет 2D.
Если в Китае мы мстили за убийство всех в ордене, то в Индии у нас романтическая линия подмешана. Не хватает традиционных для Индии песен и танцев. Ищем камень Кохинур и шкатулочку к нему.
8\10 сравнивая с другими сериями трилогии.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961801742', 'num_games_owned': 507, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 613, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 613, 'last_played': 1551771466}
review:
7/10: Assassin's Creed Chronicles - India is the second in the trilogy and continues the quick, 2.5D stealth action from China while introducing more non-lethal options. Solid and brief, if linear compared to standard Assassin's Creed titles.

Assassin's Creed - India has a story that starts out feeling a lot like Aladdin. Arbaaz is a young assassin in love with the princess, but must obtain a mysterious jewel that may be a piece of Eden, as well as a box that is extra familiar to anyone who played the first game in the trilogy. Things go wrong, inevitably leading Arbaaz to rescue her from a terrible fate and face down the Templars who threatened her and their country.

Compared to China where there were no non-lethal options besides avoiding detection entirely, Arbaaz is able to choke out enemies. This has affected the ranking system as well: while the highest rank you can get on any part is still Shadow, the second best ranking is now Silencer, and the worst one being Assassin. As such, while the game is called Assassin's Creed, actually killing anyone is going to earn less points than knocking them out, or better yet, avoiding them entirely. Otherwise the mechanics are identical to the first game, with levels either challenging the player to figure out the best way to traverse the room or race through the level as quickly as possible using running, jumping, climbing, sliding, and killing if absolutely necessary.  

Since the points you earn in the level directly affect the variety and effectiveness of your abilities, the player has no choices to make between levels regarding character build. This linear progression can feel disappointing at times, especially when you get an upgrade to assassination effectiveness when you're explicitly avoiding killing anyone. Replaying the levels on harder difficulties grants an opportunity to earn more points and more improvements to your abilities, but requires beating the entire game first.

The art is thematically consistent with the setting and accentuates everything nicely, from the background displaying a radiant palace to the environments. The color palette for interactable areas remains the same, with red used for climbable surfaces and green for hiding places, so things remain clear to the player.

Assassin's Creed Chronicles - India is a faithful middle to the trilogy and worth it if you're looking for a stealth action game you can play through in a dozen hours, or just wish Aladdin had a more hardcore conspiracy behind it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198419562991', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 836, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 836, 'last_played': 1547916580}
review:
Das Spiel hat mir leider nicht so gut gefallen wie Assassin's Creed Chronicles: China. 
An sich sind die Geschichte, die optische und akustische Aufmachung sowie die Charaktere liebevoll und gut gemacht und auch die Herausforderungen lassen das Spiel zu einem interessanten, manchmal etwas kniffligen dafür aber abwechslungsreichen Zeitvertreib werden. 

Was mir allerdings gar nicht gefallen hat, war der übermäßig große Anteil an Time-Runs: auf Zeit laufende Verfolgungen, sekundengenau abgepasste Fluchtversuche sowie Sprung- und Klettersequenzen. Das war bei  ACC: China nicht so extrem und hat mich hier zeitweise etwas genervt. Da ich jedoch jemand bin, der dennoch alles unbedingt schaffen will und nicht gern pausiert, nur weil es gerade schwierig ist, bin ich natürlich hartnäckig dran geblieben. So hat mich aber z.B. teilweise eine einzige Verfolgungssequenz sehr viel Zeit durch unzählige Versuche gekostet, bis es dann endlich zeitlich hingehauen hat oder man einfach den Weg so intus hatte, dass man nicht mehr viel nachdenken musste und man sich nicht vor lauter Ungeduld oder Anspannung doch aus Versehen verklickt hat. 
Das einzige, was ich richtig gut daran fand, war das Elefantenrennen. Eine sehr schöne Idee. ;)
Im Gegensatz zu ACC: China werde ich dieses Spiel allerdings nicht mehr im PLUS-Modus spielen und versuchen, die Datenbank zu vervollständigen und alles einzusammeln. Dafür war es mit über weite Strecken einfach zu frustrierend. 

Jetzt bin ich mal gespannt auf Mütterchen Russland...

author: {'steamid': '76561198361323524', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1547373565}

author: {'steamid': '76561198011595325', 'num_games_owned': 2477, 'num_reviews': 929, 'playtime_forever': 546, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 546, 'last_played': 1546569632}
review:
Se você jogou Assassin’s Creed® Chronicles: China sabe o que esperar desta sequencia, mudando o estilo da arte e a historia (que é bem simples), o resto do jogo é bem parecido, os gráficos, sons e jogabilidade são os mesmos, não arriscaram em nenhum diferencial grandioso. Esse jogo segue o mesmo modelo de escolher se quer passar furtivamente ou no combate em algumas partes, tem furtividade obrigatória em outra e como diferencial, mais cenas de perseguição/fuga. Recomendo pra que gosta de jogos de plataformas e da franquia AC, mas não recomendo o valor cheio e nem que seja jogado logo em sequencia dos outros Chronicles, tentei e achei muita repetição.
--------------------------
If you played Assassin's Creed® Chronicles: China knows what to expect from this sequel, changing the art style and storyline (which is quite simple), the rest of the game is very similar, graphics, sounds and gameplay are the same, not risked no grandiose differences. This game follows the same model of choosing whether to pass furtively or in combat in some parts, has compulsory stealth in another and as a differential, more scenes of persecution / escape. I recommend that you like platforms games and the AC franchise, but I do not recommend full value and even if it is played in sequence from the other Chronicles, I tried and found a lot of repetition.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136407161', 'num_games_owned': 363, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 689, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 689, 'last_played': 1545956208}
review:
"ACC India" 's got quite a good storyline, though I got somehow dissapointed because of the ones down below. Read it and find out yourself.

[b][u]Positives[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]The game's storyline is more narrative than China. Quite [b][u][i]impressive[/i][/u][/b].
[*]Environment very very well done. 19th Century's India in colors.
[*]Big refferences on the previous game - AC Chronicles China. Strongly connected to Shao Jun.
[*]Arbaaz's arrogance adds it up to the mix. It makes you more relaxed.
[/list]

[b][u]Negatives[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]What the actual F*** is wrong with the combat style?
[*]Looks like using a controller for movement makes it WORSE than it already is. (used an XBOX360 wireless controller for playing it, dunno anythin about keyboard & mouse)
[*]Detection meters look very retarded, and seem to spot you in like 1 second, whilst not even looking at you.
[*]Made me fall asleep as tired as coming from working out at the gym.

author: {'steamid': '76561198244298624', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 474, 'last_played': 1545980072}
review: 실컷 하다가 죽어버리면 다시 원점으로 돌아가기를 수차례 반복하다보니 열받아서 못하겠습니다. 체크포인트 진짜 짜증나네요. 그리고 특정 구간에서는 죽을 때마다 똑같은 컷씬 또 보게 하니 정말 질립니다. 템플러 기사단 쫓아가서 제압해서 심문하는 미션에서도 다 따라잡았는데 주인공이 하라는 제압은 안하고 갑자기 칼을 휘둘러서 맨날 실패 뜨는데 하다가 개빡쳐서 키보드 샷건 몇번 쳤습니다. 제압이랑 공격이랑 같은 버튼인데 이게 제압해야 될 때 제압이 아니라 공격이 나가니 의도한대로 조작이 안 되서 갑갑하더군요. 하여간 방금 쇠빠지게 경비병 다 죽이고 서브미션 다 깨고 앞으로 한참 나갔다가 중간에 사망하니 다시 맨 처음으로 돌아간 거 보고 열받아서 쓰는 리뷰입니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044456793', 'num_games_owned': 509, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1542880632}
review: Кривое управление, бесполезные задания "на время" успей попрыгать по ящикам пока они не опустились на исходную точку или иди повторяй. Кривое управление не даёт ничего сделать из этого нормально, прыгать по "воздуху", врезаться в "воздух", гениально. Поиграть и забыть, пустая трата времени, очередной провал из этих "хроник". Теперь я вспомнил почему забросил Китай и не стал играть дальше, спасибо Юбики. P.S. Управление настолько гениальное, что в одном из мест герой тупо летит на первый уровень из 3, чтобы подняться на второй уровень, надо попрыгать по ящикам, чтобы оказаться на третьем, нужно попрыгать по ящику, но управление тебя шлёт гулять, спасибо. Брать только по большим скидкам и фанатам серии AS.

author: {'steamid': '76561198355334610', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1586, 'last_played': 1541203796}
review:
Okay, tonight I finished another AC Chronicles game and It was pretty much the same as China with a few changes. Here goes my review:

Visual Design - 9 - Gorgeous game as usual from the AC franchise, however I did liked better the artwork of the cutscenes of China. Level design is beautiful, the India atmosphere is a nice change but I will say China was slightly better.

Gameplay - 6 - Pretty much the same as China, that's why I'm giving it a 6. With sidescrollers you can do much more...yet it fails to try new things.

Music - 8 - Nice music but pretty normal in general.

Story - 7 - The story has a nice beginning but yet again these chronicles games are a bit too predictable. I wish they would elaborate more but it is a small short game.

Overall Score: 7.5 - I liked the new feeling of China but this game fails to give me a new flavor... It's pretty much the same with a different skin. I got the 3 chronicles at a discount sale so I am not complaining for what I got. I would not recommend buying it like that (as the combo), just get China.

review: 难度不高，但有些关卡恶意逼迫玩家背板，只能说很无语。买三部曲前听说这几部不值这个钱，现在来看的确如此，完全是卖情怀的东西，专门选了中印俄三个育碧玩家有一定数量但又总体不多的国家来做，只能说这种独立游戏质量的作品完全是骗人玩意儿。

author: {'steamid': '76561198347661908', 'num_games_owned': 255, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 1522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1457, 'last_played': 1547903022}
review:
打了一关，感觉没有编年史中国难。印度的风景还挺好看的。

全鬼影金牌通关一次。刷成就中。

全成就完成！特别提醒：若是要想完成“非同寻常的刺客”（英文：Not Your Usual Assassin）这个成就，在第四章中若是触发了光束，而且士兵进入光束而死，那么这个士兵会当做是你杀的，导致成就解不开。因此在有士兵，并且旁边就是触发光束的地方，要避免触发光束，并且避免被士兵发现。这是我查英文才查到的，根本没有靠谱的中文攻略。

author: {'steamid': '76561198216979291', 'num_games_owned': 300, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1538831075}
review:
《刺客信条编年史：印度》带来了一股绚丽多彩的独特风格，游戏期初承诺将会和之前的《刺客信条编年史：中国》截然不同，但 很显然，游戏似乎越走越歪,画面上来说，本作的确非常艳丽，但游戏却在其他地方跌倒，作为一款潜入游戏，薄弱的战术设定以及脆弱的任务目标都让游戏倒退了一步，游戏甚至还没有中国好玩。IGN给出了6.0分。（此前《刺客信条编年史：中国》的IGN评分为6.4）

优点：

　　＋绚丽的环境

　　＋多变的潜入技巧

缺点：

　　－让人乏味的任务

　　－过多即死场景

　　－死亡过于廉价

评分：6.0 尚可

　　《刺客信条编年史：印度》有着前作中国没能体现的核心特点，然而糟糕的关卡设计让游戏反而倒退了一步。

总评：

　　在剧情叙事方面，《刺客信条编年史：印度》解决了前作中国拖沓不前的节奏，同时提供了一个更加色彩斑斓的世界，然而失败的关卡设计让游戏过程中的死亡过于廉价，这毕竟是一款动作游戏，但它没能够让玩家找到享受乐趣的方法。

author: {'steamid': '76561198178893207', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 402, 'last_played': 1538708040}
review:
Very decent sidescroller, the level design is good, it doesn't feel repetitive and the art style is in my opinion more astonishing than the previous iteration.

There are some small gameplay improvements over Assassin'S Creed Chronicles: China: you can knock down enemies, which make less noise than killing them, and the smoke bomb lets you pass guarded zones, making the gameplay a little more fluid.

The game is heavily focused on stealth and it's highly rewarded. Unless you have "helix" the combat is dreadful and I avoided it at all cost. The story is slightly more engaging than China, still forgettable, but at least I wanted to see it through to the end.

If you enjoyed Assassin'S Creed Chronicles: China or you like sidescrollers, you will most likely enjoy India; otherwise don't bother, because is more of the same. Still a solid experience if you can get it for cheap.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161165938', 'num_games_owned': 244, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 1554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 505, 'last_played': 1604334225}
review:
Chronicles serisinin 2. oyunu, Hindistan topraklarında bu kez seyahat fırsatı veriyor bize.

[i] Tanıdığımız kişiden olan bir emanetin [/i] bu kez bu topraklara geldiğini duyuyoruz. Hikaye bunun üstünden şekilleniyor.

Yalan yok, oyun gerçekten de sinir sisteminizi alt üst ediyor. Özellikle zamana karşı yarışlar ve yetişmeniz veya yakalanmamanız gereken görevlerin fazlalığı, maalesef bu oyundan biraz soğumama yetti.

Fakat, ACC China'da alamadığımız bir şeyi veriyor bu kez. Eksik kalmış dediğim şey....Ondan memnun kaldım.
Yine de, suikastçılara hayran olmamızı Shau'nun doldurmadığı gibi Arbaaz da dolduramıyor .

ACC China'dan sonra devamını merak edenler vakit kaybetmesin ve alıp oynasın diyorum :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198253741308', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 708, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 686, 'last_played': 1556998079}
review:
Tento díl AC není jako klasický (běžný) AC ale je jiný. S touhle hrou jsem nebyl zas tak úplně spokojený, ale nebyl jsem ani zklamaný. Někdo si tenhle typ AC chválí a někdo zase ne.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050711908', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 437, 'last_played': 1535127101}
review:
차이나보다 훨씬 낫네요. 그래픽이나 스토리텔링도 훨씬 좋아졌고, 적들의 패턴도 다양해서 덜 지루합니다.
연속으로 골드등급 받아야 제대로 된 점수를 받는다는 건 좀 짜증나긴 하네요.

차이나보다 난이도 올라갔다고 하는데, 헬릭스도 강화되었고 연막탄이나 차크람이 워낙 좋아서 전 차이나보다 어렵다는 느낌은 못받았습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038617875', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 186, 'playtime_forever': 366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 366, 'last_played': 1535059797}
review:
Segundo capítulo de la trilogía plataformera [i]Assassin's Creed Chronicles[/i].

Que complicado! Dispararon casi al infinito la dificultad. Ni punto de comparación con el primero que fue en mi opinión demasiado fácil.
Sorprende y se agradece (menos cuando te estancas que maldices; en el jefe final me detectaron como 20 veces....)

En el aspecto gráfico los colores son brutales. Que colorido para un juego 2.5D !!
La historia te envuelve y se deja disfrutar, conectas con el asesino indio.
Si eres fan de la saga te gustará; si te gustan los juegos de sigilo + plataforma te encantará.

[h1]Valoración final: 8/10[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198259803091', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1534922411}

author: {'steamid': '76561198290841143', 'num_games_owned': 38, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1527816722}
review: This is probably the best game for beginners to learn about the core mechanics of Asssassin's Creed. How? Make it a sidescroller! But is it worth 10 bucks? .......No. I would say it's worth about five bucks, but either way it is a solid game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994968074', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1533691702}
review: The gameplay and solutions work like this: time the platform puzzle **perfectly**, in the singular (and only) way it was developed or you die. There are often no other ways to solve a puzzle, and they've made them so difficult it takes 25+ times before you (example) open a gate, jump up the wall, jump from wall to a rising pillar, jump from that pillar to another to another, then to the opening at the top of the room, with nothing but perfecft timing. And, no, it's not that I'm a bad gamer, nor my reflexes slow... it's just this game often requires the impossible: to anticipate what the game designer has programmed, then do that thing exactly. This is bad game, but that's what I get for trusting anything with the name Assassin's Creed. (for the record, I generally enjoy games when there is more than a single solution to a puzzle; that's good game design. It's simply more engaging, fun, and gives replayability. When a gamer is locked into a single solution, and then the solution is nearly impossible, it is not fun, it's work. And I didn't buy a GAME to work or get frustrated. It's stupposed to be FUN!!!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198167263238', 'num_games_owned': 146, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1531205883}
review:
相変わらずグラフィックや舞台の雰囲気は素晴らしいのですがチャイナよりも難易度が上がり何回どころか何十回も
やり直させられる場面がいくつもあるので正直うんざりしました
大砲の弾や壊れる建築物を避けながら進むパートもありますがチャイナのような爽快感はなく初見殺しが多いし何をすればいいのかどこにいけばいいのかがわかりにくいので結果何回もやり直しさせられます
自分みたいな下手くそかつ堪え性がないゲーマーにはおすすめできないです・・・

author: {'steamid': '76561198438775716', 'num_games_owned': 158, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 879, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 879, 'last_played': 1531098392}
review: Habiendo jugado previamente la 1ra entrega de china, puedo decir que esta version de india me gusto mucho mas, juego con una mejor dinamica, variedad de escenarios, jugabilidad mas simple, incluso hasta encontre mejor la historia, siendo que los assassins hasta el momento no me han sorprendido por ese apartado, y algo que cambia bastante con la 1ra entrega que este es mucho mas directo, el sigilo siempre esta presente pero hay que matar mucho mas, lo que no esta nada mal. en resumen dejo recomendado el juego!

author: {'steamid': '76561198312576624', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 489, 'last_played': 1585941398}
review: O jogo não é tão bom como eu pensei, achei a mecânica de combate bem ruinzinha, sem falar que tem vezes que eu dou um comando e o personagem simplesmente não obedece. É o primeiro Assassin's Creed que deixo de jogar por simplesmente não gostar do jogo, e isso é algo ruim, pois agora estou com certo receio de jogar os outros dois jogos da série Chronicles (ese foi o primeiro dos três que joguei).

author: {'steamid': '76561198011965365', 'num_games_owned': 2442, 'num_reviews': 2084, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1498787375}
review:
The game has a stronger narrative than China. The game play was okayish. The visuals were beautiful. 

Pros
Distinctive visual style
stealth
combat mechanics

Cons
platform sections
Going into combat gives you a lower score
Controls are annoying (USE CONTROLLER)7
Over-repeated dialogue

author: {'steamid': '76561198300520347', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 915, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 915, 'last_played': 1530155846}
review:
首先我终于连得上土豆云了
编年史这三部曲已经爆关了中国，印度，现在这个印度篇就会不由地会跟中国篇比较
怎么说跟中国篇相比真的差太多了
我这个人评游戏要不是这游戏屎得让我骂爹骂娘砸键盘摔手柄我基本都不会写差评
基本上印度篇把中国篇一些亮眼的地方全部扔了，个人在游玩中体验十分的一般
中国篇的水墨风我个人非常喜欢，到了印度色彩突然就鲜艳了起来，充满咖喱风情也很不错，游戏前半部分进入宫殿见公主的时候，那个远景，宫殿的圆顶还是很漂亮的，可惜到了后期特别是到了阿富汗的时候，都是单调的风景与大量的室内场景，之前的美景就一去不复返了。。。本来非写实的场景设计就是要表现艺术效果的，然而这种溢出屏幕的屎色配色，完全就跟艺术二字毫不沾边。
影响游戏体验的一点还有就是与中国篇相比较，印度篇玩起来流畅感相当不好，一方面是增加了一些完全很无谓的角色，只能边缘刺杀的高丽人，躲在阴影里的刺客杀手，这种就变相使得任务路线变得单一，而且跟中国篇的一些平面切换屋里屋外的转移 ，在2D游戏里进行像3D一样的走位绕敌这个特色在印度篇里几乎没有见到，切换平面完全仅仅是起到切换场景的作用。跑酷关卡与前作相比也逊色不少，各种老阴比拌雷十分讨厌。。
另外想吐槽的就是，去到先行者的遗迹中，那些陷阱是对刺客陷阱吧，你看看人家圣殿骑士直接搭电梯上楼的。。。这tm防范对象反了吧。。。
说了这么多说说优点。。。貌似只有比中国篇增加了双重刺杀。。。真没了
哦还有印度刺客小哥的配音很好听，特别喜欢那个got it，性格我也很喜欢
总结：一坨还过得去的屎（5.5/10）

author: {'steamid': '76561198236759496', 'num_games_owned': 319, 'num_reviews': 237, 'playtime_forever': 1081, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1081, 'last_played': 1527786799}
review:
india主角的的配音也太容易了，就两句
“need move fast”    “faster，faster”
这样一想，发现刺客系列的敌人都会那么一句 
“too slow”
原来是一个意思啊，怪不得玩的脾气都上来了
现在我终于把这个跑酷游戏打通关了
手都已经废了，尤其是摁左ctrl的小拇指，手残党玩不起
画面比起中国要鲜艳，一开始的背景音乐有点像2里面的音乐，这些都是我比较喜欢的地方
但是后来的每个章节基本上都是在和时间比赛，死的次数都赶得上我前面玩的几部加起来
对我而言，玩的开心的游戏就是好评，玩的特别烦躁和生气的游戏就是差评
所以我必须要给这个india打差评，玩的我特别气
此外，应该是最后一章里，有一个特别难跳过的地方
需要你滑铲+跳才能过去，其他难过的地方就是手速问题了

author: {'steamid': '76561198041110379', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 491, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 491, 'last_played': 1527767440}
review:
Отличное продолжение "Chronicles", шикарный визуальный стиль. Очень калоритная в отличие от первой части, множество нововведений (вскрытие дверей, обыск и кража, стрельба из снайперки) неплохой саундтрек, жуткое управление с клавиатуры. Достаточно длительная в прохождение: некоторые моменты пройти очень просто, а на некоторых пукан горит от сложности. Даже для фанатов серии рекомендую преобретать со скидкой и играть с геймпада. 
4 шакрама из 5

author: {'steamid': '76561198141723968', 'num_games_owned': 534, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1508581625}
review:
어쌔신 크리드 크로니클즈의 2번째 작품입니다

전작에 없던 기능들을 추가하였으며 난이도 또한 대폭 상승하였습니다
근데 그 난이도가 너무 상승을 해버리는 바람에 무쌍은 거의 불가능해졌으며
역시나 키보드로 플레이하면 X같은 조작감으로 인해 매우불편합니다

그러니 패드를 이용하여 플레이를 하시기 바랍니다

아. 그리고 스토리는 별로였던 전작보다 더 별로입니다

author: {'steamid': '76561198070517054', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1678299897}
review:
《有烟雾弹，真的可以为所欲也》

游戏时长：15小时左右
游戏玩法：相比中国画质加强不少，控制僵硬还是存在
                     - 新增 烟雾弹 比鞭炮强到不知道什么地方！
                     - 新增 空中双杀等高难度动作
                     - 新增 快速模式 杀杀人跑跑图还挺好

                 呃！有的地图设置很不合理，一周目强迫症最好尝试全鬼影，太难了。尝试全程烟雾弹快速杀人通关，二周目快感会多很多。

author: {'steamid': '76561197976822697', 'num_games_owned': 64, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1527489257}
review:
A Beautiful game.  Haven't enjoyed a side-scroller this much since Ninja Gaiden.  I am a big fan of all things Assassins Creed, and the Chronicles games have fit right in.  

On the down-side, I do find the default keyboard controls to be nearly impossible.  A quick keyboard configuration is a small price to pay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062031222', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1490500970}

author: {'steamid': '76561198021974608', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 348, 'last_played': 1522537442}
review:
India ist der wohl schlechteste, frustrierendste und nervigste Teil der ganzen Trilogie.
Der Schauplatz mag ja cool sein, genau so wie einige neue Mechaniken, im Vergleich zu China. Aber..

Hätte ich mitbestimmen können wie man dieses Spiel hier nennt, so wäre es Trial and Error: Indien.

Ich hab mich in meinen 22 Jahren noch nicht einmal wirklich aufgeregt wenn etwas in einem Spiel nicht klappt, aber das hier war kurz davor mich dazu zubringen, zu schauen ob mein Xbox Controller die Wand im Flug aushält oder nicht. 

Ich hasse diesen Teil. Besonders die letzteren Level, achtung Spoiler bla bla, wo der Typ am MG hockt und einfach random ballert und ebenso random trifft. Entweder trifft er dich direkt wieder am Checkpoint, so dass du spawnst und direkt wieder stirbst, oder kurz vorm Ende erst, so dass du die Kacke nochmal machen musst.

Was mich auch tierisch angekotzt hat ist der Filter der auf dem Spiel liegt. Wer kam auf die Idee diese Bildkörnung einzufügen? Das regt tierisch auf, weg kriegt man es laut Internet auch nicht. An meinem Ende liegt es nicht. China und Russia haben diesen Filter nicht. Und falls es euch im gesamten Durchlauf von India nicht aufgefallen ist, was ich bezweifel, dann schaut euch die Stellen an wo man sich verstecken kann, oder auch einfach nur Ebenen auf denen viel schwarz ist. Hat man es einmal gesehen, nervt es ungemein.

So, das ist mein Senf zu dem Spiel. Ich hasse es. Macht n Bogen um den Mist.

author: {'steamid': '76561198221866976', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1522551613}
review: 虽然道具的使用较上代有不少提升，但关卡里各种即死非常影响体验。

author: {'steamid': '76561198323832392', 'num_games_owned': 738, 'num_reviews': 293, 'playtime_forever': 1846, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1362, 'last_played': 1522389080}
review:
还是感觉很好玩！各种逃生、各种冒险、各种刺杀、各种打击、真心好玩！画风也好看，操作也比刺客信条编年史：中国好些！不过对我来说都一样！

维护win10系统，毕竟win10就是拿来打游戏的！还有输入法问题！win10不需要下载输入法，因为本来自带有，你们只要自己动动手指设置下就好，这样打游戏时就不会出现错误或者输入法弹出等的问题了！不管你玩什么游戏都能正常使用键盘游玩！

author: {'steamid': '76561198063115240', 'num_games_owned': 2836, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 5772, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1461, 'last_played': 1589138213}
review:
A side-scrolling Assassin's Creed game based on the graphic novel Assassin's Creed: Brahman.

Story is great and nothing is very different from the book. So if you're a fan of the book, you'll probably love this game.

Game-play has its pros and cons, there are some puzzle-like levels which I like and chase scenes were fun too but the realism is messed up with Helix skills, which basically gives you magical powers and they are required to be used in the game most of the time.

Soundtrack suits the game well enough, it's not great though. The graphics and artworks are really well done.

There are some hard achievements on Uplay for you to complete as well.

I would recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100329548', 'num_games_owned': 377, 'num_reviews': 280, 'playtime_forever': 591, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 528, 'last_played': 1522237542}
review:
一般般吧，开始教程都卡了半天，原来第一个带刀守卫要蹲杀

关卡流程rush的情况多，耐心等机会的情况少

大多数路线必须按照套路来，没有第二选择

第二关关底真是奇葩设计

还有非常烂的判定和卡地形bug，经常会卡在某些角落动不了或者挂在墙上动弹不得

鬼才知道设计F+G这种按键设定是怎么想出来的，F+左键不行么？

author: {'steamid': '76561198271621062', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1521954979}
review:
From the design perspective the visuals are stunning, the settings are pretty interesting and the fights and challenges entertaining to an extent. However, all this is is ruined by extremely clunky controls that take all the fun away. Two hours into the game, I am yet to use a whistle or a sound bomb. Whatever I do, whatever it says on screen, I faithfully replicate it, and all I get is zilch. 

In the combat training mode, I cannot change the direction which I am facing. If the enemy happens to land at my back, we are stuck there walking forwards and back with the guy stuck to my back. The only way to break the deadlock is by exiting the training mode.

What an utter shame!

author: {'steamid': '76561198283051710', 'num_games_owned': 177, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1589553431}
review:
游戏中冲出来差评。
屏幕那么点，字幕站了三分之一，完全遮住了前方情况。Esc后还没有选项修改，贼恶心。更操蛋还不能改键位。道具F瞄准G发射，你鼠标发射会死啊，那个雁刀，鼠标向上一点轨迹就变得乱七八糟，下拉还改不回来，神经病一样的设计，我都后悔买了编年史三部，第三部俄国没玩也不想玩了。也就第一部中国好看好玩点。
提一句题外话，妈的。uplay游戏下载0kb/s，还让我上不了网，打不开网页，玩毛

author: {'steamid': '76561198437387805', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1178, 'last_played': 1521514731}
review:
I've always felt as if the entire Assassin's Creed Chronicles games have been given a bad rap. Though they may not be like the man AC titles, I still find lots of fun with this series since they offer a unique twist on the AC formua, all this coming from someone who has 100% synced every main AC Title. 

Specifically for AC Chronicles India, I feel like this game did a good job learning from the mistakes of the first game. A lot of the mechanics have been fine tuned so that the gameplay is expanded by how the missions are structured. I am also a big fan of the unique art style Ubisoft in ach game. The tapestry like art in this game is visually appealing and really makes it distinct from the first game. The only real problem I had with this game was the pacing as I felt as if the game had too many timed sequences in the main story line as opposed to the more open free world levels that was fun from the first game. 

As an avid AC fan, I recomend this to anyone who would like a fresh take on the old AC formula. It's different, but in no ways bad. Make sure that you get he whole trilogy though since there is an underlying story that brings them all togther!

author: {'steamid': '76561198118896235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1520034591}
review:
Like half of the missions are about you finishing them under a given time. Not cool. Moreover, comparisons with AC China are unavoidable. In general you do not have the same freedom as in AC China to do things your way. 


On the other hand, graphics are good and colourful (although I still prefer AC China aquarela style). If you liked AC China, this game can be good, but wait for a discount. Full price is not worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066993637', 'num_games_owned': 790, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1519855547}
review:
[h1]"Mécanicas más pulidas"[/h1]

Assassin’s Creed Chronicles: India es la continuación de de la Saga tipo Spin off de Chronicles lanzado en el 2016 por Ubisoft, en el que se nos da pistas sobre el paradero de la misteriosa caja que poseía Ezio Auditore perdida por Shao Jun.
Aqui tomamos el papel de Arbaaz Mir, un asesino indio quién debe investigar más la naturaleza mistica de la caja, y su función a la par que intenta rescatar a sus seres queridos de manos de los templarios.

Básicamente el juego es lo mismo que lo presentado en Chronicles China, sin embargo se nos dan más uso a las habilidades "Hélix", mas capacidad de inventario, y nuevas mécanicas como el uso de armas de fuego para cumplir ciertos objetivos, pero sin embargo no son aprovechados del todo.

Es muy corto con una duración media de 3 horas (1 hora menos que Chronicles China), pero es recomendable que pilles este juego en el pack de trilogía durante las Ofertas de Steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198221435384', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 450, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 376, 'last_played': 1542389935}
review:
阿碧每次打折都有你！！！！！
喜欢的游戏以前都买了，但是新年不给育碧花点钱都不好意思说自己是粉丝，所以把编年史的印度和俄罗斯都买了
之前通关的中国，个人觉得游戏素质还可以
这款印度同样作为一款休（xiu）闲（xian）游戏，难度不大，新手玩家多死几遍都能过
但是屎一样的游戏判定，我每次读档都想砸手柄
玩了6个小时，就目前而言个人觉得剧情比较中庸，套路我都能背出来了，但是还没通关所以不好下结论
阿碧的游戏从来没有给过差评，粉丝滤镜还是给个好评吧
总体而言：不推荐入手！ 
【 育碧粉、刺客信条粉放心大胆入，谁也不能阻止我们的信仰23333】
【PS:另一款同类型的游戏 忍者之印（mark of ninja）就做的很好，推荐喜欢这类游戏的朋友去试试】
不说了、起源终于更新好了，我去埃及旅游了

author: {'steamid': '76561198412392145', 'num_games_owned': 52, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 376, 'last_played': 1516907379}
review:
故事流程敷衍，主角和反派都像小学表演课上的角色，毫无代入感。
操作恶心到家，默认shift疾跑，左ctrl下蹲，这两个按键在后面两关是关键的连招，但制作组默认键位根本没考虑中文玩家切换输入法的问题。
关卡设计是最恶心的，所有可称为游戏时长的内容，都是人为延长的，而不是精巧设计的关卡。
还有谜一样的跳跃判定，以及路线暗示。
不说了，如果你是刺客信条脑残粉的话，就买中国篇本体好了。
像我这样把印度篇买了的，不是脑残粉是脑残。
精神退款。

author: {'steamid': '76561198019730955', 'num_games_owned': 174, 'num_reviews': 197, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1516064022}
review:
Xmas girft from my friend.

At first I liked it, because the Indian architecture and artstyle reminded me of Prince Persia a bit, Halfway through the game I hated the game more and more, because there's way too many obscure little stupid things that get you killed.

Like the part where you have to run away from machinegun fire. It's almost random whether you make it or not, as you climb through the buildings, because you can only climb as fast as the game lets you (you can hold down shift to be a bit faster), maybe gain a little bit of distance with leaps, but even during leaps a stray bullet might kill you - happened to me on several occasions.

The speedrun levels are way worse as well.

The only level I really liked was inside the Vault. First of all, it's the vault - how cool is that! Second, it has lots of cool traps which you can use to kill the enemy. Just a shame it doesn't really reward you well for it with points, because they usually alarm the others, but it's way too fun! The platforming segments in the Vault are fun as well.

Later you'll find tripwire traps as well. You can disarm them, but when you're in a hurry and try to jump over or slide under them, it gets weird, because for whatever reason you sometimes still touch the wire, even if you do the correct movement.

The only addition I can safely say I like in this game is the assassin enemy type. They lurk in dark places and although they can instakill you, so they work much like traps, if you don't spot them. You can take them out with smoke bombs.

Played it through in 5 hours, then there's the usual Game Plus, challenge rooms, blablabla..

Overall I prefer AC Chronicles China far and wide over this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198399184933', 'num_games_owned': 153, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1515059279}
review:
[h1]缺乏突破的第二作 [/h1]

第一篇中国刚写完，便赶过来写第二篇。印度篇玩过后，缺少了中国篇给人眼前一亮的感觉，整体上来说没有什么变动，除了鲜明亮丽的油彩画风，武器方面就是改了个名字，基本沿用中国篇的东西。难度上确实降低了不少，没有中国里那种很难的感觉了。
但是，我觉得编年史的制作组在剧情上做的有出彩的地方：
印度篇的主线是围绕着[spoiler]抢夺伊甸碎片[/spoiler]展开的，让我觉得出彩的地方是最后一关[spoiler] 救公主[/spoiler]，最后[spoiler] 放弃盒子选择公主[/spoiler]让我觉得很赞，我觉得这样才是真实的人。

[b] 优劣之处[/b]
优点方面只有可圈可点的几点：一是油彩画风很养眼，看看异国风光也不错；二是先行者遗迹的加入，让游戏增添了几分色彩。总之还是信仰必入。
劣处方面，剧情总体略显俗套，其他。。。好像也没什么值得说的，整体突破小。不是刺客粉入手此作要考虑下自己的需求。

[b]总结[/b]
印度篇虽说缺少中国篇那种独特的风格，但还是值得推荐的。好了，不说了，去写俄国篇了。

author: {'steamid': '76561197977450814', 'num_games_owned': 568, 'num_reviews': 430, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1514872433}
review:
I remember why I gave the previous game Assassin's Creed Chronicles: China a low rating because this game has not only refused to improve the game beyond the previous game's initial release I feel that the overall spirit of the series has gotten worse.

Most of the concepts and material has been recycled from China with almost no new gameplay mechanics.

Let's start off with story first and move onto some of the flaws.

You start off with a very bland assassin called Arbaaz who needs to recover a very rare jewel that is said to interact and power Ezio's box which you should be familiar with in China. The story continues over several memory sequences and the whole plot is uninspired and feels like its only there to connect the free-running sequences with duct tape. Also, helix glitches, these pop out of nowhere and make no sense to the story, so random...

Combat is still clunky and horrendous, for more details see my review on Chronicles China.
Control is not as accurate as it seems, leading to constant deaths and restarts
Hard to see where to climb
Sight-cones are glitchy, cheap and even worse than before, sometimes diagonal cones will alert guards if you are standing even 1-2 millimeters [b]outside[/b] the cone.
Puckle gun escape sequence is incredible infuriating and stupid, because if you are [b]too fast[/b] the gun will pre-emptively move ahead and kill you immediately.
The game overall is short, 6-7 hours on a playthrough
Less creative scenarios compared to AC China.

Absolutely frustrating experience.

Only positive note is that it looks somewhat pretty and colorful, also... elephants, yeah.

author: {'steamid': '76561198168409212', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1514009877}
review:
Out of all the Asscred Chronicles I’ve played, this one is my favorite. 

- The game mechanics is the same as China, with the whole tutorial as well. The difficulty of the game is the same hard as to China (with sync time and all the fighting thing). So not much different (I guess)

- It’s a great change from China because they added more features to the game like pickpocket so you can steal instead of killing/take the enemies down, disguises and sniping from a far. It has more colors now, which made the game REALLY beautiful. The artwork is just so stunning to see. Loving it a lot.

- The songs are very chilling and powerful, I like it very much.

- The lore is the continuation from the previous game (about the box thing), so you get to know more about it and about the character itself as well. I love the main character very much, cause he has a witty character (it’s a good change from all that revenge and vengeance thing) so he was pretty fun to play with.

All in all, this is the best Asscred Chronicles from all three. With such a fun character to play with, I enjoy this game very much. The artwork and the colors is the winner here. If you love colorful tones with outstanding art, and simple stealth game, this is it for you.
- 10/10 Recommend

author: {'steamid': '76561198293975630', 'num_games_owned': 130, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1510455195}

author: {'steamid': '76561198059962841', 'num_games_owned': 1413, 'num_reviews': 157, 'playtime_forever': 474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 474, 'last_played': 1510109953}
review:
Cara, esse jogo é bom, mas não conseguir gostar mais dele do que do primeiro da trilogia Chronicles, o China, primeiro porque o personagem não tem tanto carisma assim, pelo menos eu achei, e a história desse é bem mais rasa, do que no primeiro, acho que foi contada de uma forma bem melhor e mais clara. 

O jogo é uma evolução do primeiro, tem algumas características diferente, devido claro a sua ambientação, se adequando a cultura da india, na qual o jogo se passa, e isso melhorou bastante a imersividade do game, porém, muito dessas novas mecânicas não são bem "otimizadas", fazendo com que vários pulos e movimentações sejam um pouco impresisas, e isso me deixou um pouco incomodado, diferente do primeiro no qual o jogo tem uma movimentação muito boa, nesse game, a movimentação as vezes "buga" e você acaba caindo e tendo que voltar tudo. Mas ainda sim é um jogo excelente e muito bem feito, os gráficos são bonitos para um ambiente em 2.5D, é bem mais colorido do que o China, e o nível de dificuldade é similar, só a história que não curti muito, mas recomendo o jogo, vale a pena a compra da trilogia e dar uma chance a esse spin-off da saga Assassin's Creed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198332833836', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 391, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 391, 'last_played': 1503416877}
review:
刺客信条编年史3部曲中的印度篇。

主角阿尔巴兹直接有个公主女朋友真好。最后也是爱美人不管盒子（这点我还是挺认同的）。

攻击特效是印度特色的花纹，背景也极为绚丽。好了开始说缺点。

无论是内容，画面，关卡还是剧情都缩水严重。

中途的遗迹关卡明显就是省事省钱的方法。真的很恶心。大量的关卡直接判定为跑酷关卡。前两关真的做得很出色，也就前两关了。后面的重复让整个游戏奔掉。无论是支线还是主线做得也很不近人意。

假如单买就不建议，三部曲的包一起买，还行，毕竟中间有一段剧情（其实也不，毕竟对我来说主要剧情其实是中国篇和俄罗斯篇，印度篇某种意义上并没有什么存在感）

author: {'steamid': '76561197979913660', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1701330493}
review:
Assassin's Creed Chronicles: India shows us what a difference a charming protagonist makes in this series. China had the exact same problem Assassin's Creed III had, a humorless and uncharismatic protagonist, and after playing this right after China I can really see the difference it makes on the game experience as a whole since China and India aren't really that mechanically different.

But there are improvements everywhere, both in movement, combat and even pacing. This game has several chase levels and pure puzzle levels which gives the player a break from sneaking around and fighting enemies which can get boring at times because of the combat system. And once again I must say I really enjoyed the callbacks to Assassin's Creed 2 and III in the soundtrack.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971121754', 'num_games_owned': 633, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 509, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 509, 'last_played': 1501874673}
review:
This is the second in the Chronicles games and it was a let down from AC:C China. It started off promising with the idea of playing w/o kills and the character seemed interesting. Then the timer levels got a little bit annoying, then the sniper levels where i had to use my mouse to aim and controller to shoot were quick, but something I didn't find added to the game. The final sequence of timers, kill all the guards, and stealthily sneak up on the enemy were more frustrating and of the "i have to memorize the pattern" variety. The payoff at the end was rather meh for me as I was hoping the main character would have a little more personality. The game is decent and worth a cheap pick-up if you like the AC universe and haven't gotten it already. 
One final note, I found some of the quick platforming difficult to see things on. I'm R/G/Br colorblind and the palette in the game was mostly those shades(i think...) which made seeing things like booby traps and where to climb a little more difficult.
Off to play through Russia!

review: Достойный преемник своего предшественника AC Chronicles Китай, с большим количеством головоломок, свободным ходом с паркуром и в целом новых способов борьбы. Я лично думал, что AC Хроника В избранном Китаи немного больше.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121071860', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 357, 'last_played': 1500824998}
review:
В отличае от Китая, Индия всё же посложней будет, но сюжет я прошёл уже за 6 часов вместо 10, потраченных на прохождение Китая. Игра всё так же хороша. Опыт? Так что не пойму откуда плохие отзовы появились. С нетерпением жду, когда буду проходить следующую часть. Стелс всё тот же и геймплей увлекательный. Кто не играл - берите и не пожалеете. всё же фраза "Отличное 2D лучше кривого 3D" всё ещё актуальна и это радует. Ассасинам очень идет 2D.
Сюжет простенький, но если в Китае мы мстили за убийство всех в ордене, то в Индии у нас романтическая линия подмешана. Не хватает традиционных для Индии песен и танцев. Ищем камень Кохинур и шкатулочку к нему.
PS: Игра очень геймпадикозависисмая. В общем, купите XBOX совместимый контроллер. Много места и денег не займёт, зато получите удовольствие 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008576331', 'num_games_owned': 2354, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 545, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 545, 'last_played': 1500401578}
review: A worthy successor to its predecessor AC Chronicles China, with more puzzles, free running/parkour and generally new ways to combat. I personally though liked AC Chronicles China a bit more.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100871281', 'num_games_owned': 4297, 'num_reviews': 241, 'playtime_forever': 1561, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1561, 'last_played': 1499954905}
review:
第一印象是画面艳丽，内容比《中国》多了摸尸，全鬼影难度比《中国》小，另外比起“爆炸弹”这个名字，我还是喜欢“凤鸣镖”，有中国味。

反击只用按一个键了，这个很重要，特别是第9关底。

想Uplay全成就的需要注意第4、5关的时候，跑酷陷阱杀敌也算杀人的！而9、10关随便杀人，就是这么区别对待。

author: {'steamid': '76561197995660955', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1490352294}
review:
As a whole, 'Assassin's Creed Chronicles' is a subpar stealth game with a number of more fluid and well executed rivals that came out even before the release of this game. However, if you are a fan of the franchise, you might find the narrative and character diversity and scope refreshing and enough to keep you going through the game itself, which despite not being the best, isn't that bad either and will offer you a bit of challenge here and there.

You can find my full review here: http://thelpq.blogspot.com/2017/06/assassins-creed-chronicles.html.

author: {'steamid': '76561198324528297', 'num_games_owned': 337, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 501, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 501, 'last_played': 1496854634}
review:
[h1]一位刺客大师的肆意挥洒[/h1]

个人觉得最好玩的一部刺客信条编年史作品。


[list]
    [*]优点：
                  画风艳丽明亮，CG很漂亮；
                  剧情紧凑，体验酣畅淋漓，就像一位刺客大师的肆意挥洒；
                 难度相比编年史中国降低很多，类似的最后两章是全游戏最爽快的部分；

    [*]缺点： 
                 横板设定，不适合简述操作的键位设置；
                 BOSS战不尽人意，貌似改成QTE会更好？
                 剧情结束的突如其来，部分剧情过度不自然；


    [*]总评：
                 刺客信条编年史印度算是整个编年史三部曲里面最出色的作品了。艳丽而带有浓厚地域风情的画面，充满地区特点的建筑动物和服饰，自信满满潇洒不羁的主角三哥报的美人归的剧情，适中的难度在兼顾剧情的同时又很好地展现了游戏主题。考虑到对键鼠玩家的不友好特性，可以给7.5/10。
                 PS：参考漫画《刺客信条：婆罗门》，体验更佳。
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198137502098', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 319, 'playtime_forever': 425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1508586872}
review: Szczerze polubiłam tę grę. Po pierwsze: po raz kolejny udało im się oddać klimat miejsca w którym dzieją się wydarzenia - w tym przypadku malownicze Indie. Spodobał mi się również główny bohater. Jego osobowość jest o wiele lepiej przedstawiona niż Shao Jun z Chin. Trochę przypominał mi młodego Ezia. Co do samej mechaniki gry: dodano wiele usprawnień. W końcu mogłam sensownie zagrać padem (owszem głównie grałam na klawiaturze, ale przy wkurzających etapach na czas posiłkowałam się kontrolerem bo było łatwiej). Nasz assasin potrafi to co bohaterka z poprzedniej części + okradać wrogów, otwierać zamki wytrychem, rozbrajać pułapki itd. Jedyny zarzut jaki mogłabym zrobić to samouczek. Jeśli ktoś nie grał w poprzednią część będzie miał pod górę - brak tu nauki podstaw (zamiast treningu dostajemy tylko plansze wyjaśniające i radź sobie człowieku sam). Ogólnie: strasznie polecam. Gra nie jest łatwa jeśli ktoś chce przejść mając wysoki wynik, ale fabuła i gameplay są takie fajne, że na pewno miło przy niej spędzicie czas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092497948', 'num_games_owned': 312, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1526445670}

author: {'steamid': '76561198085476227', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 977, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 928, 'last_played': 1497702314}
review:
The second game in the Assassin's Creed Chronicles series, this time in India.
The environments are beautiful and it really transports you to India.
Don't let the fact that this is a platform game fool you.  You still need to be stealthy and have perfect timing to make it through a level.
Some will recommend playing the game with a gamepad, but I used a keyboard and mouse - no problem.
I really enjoyed this game.  The addition of the Challenge Rooms is a really nice touch - it will definitely help you improve your skills.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043183408', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 509, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 509, 'last_played': 1491240912}
review: La direction artistique est intéressante mais malheureusement gâchée par un gameplay trop rigide et un level design très moyen. Bien en dessous de l'épisode précédent (China).

author: {'steamid': '76561198121494000', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1490829390}
review:
Bon, pour la beauté graphique du jeu c'est beau (Comme pour les 2 autres qui ont chacun leur style). 
Pour ce qui est du reste en revanche...
L'histoire en effet suit le premier opus (qui est en Chine) mais le scénario est vraiment bateau et n'a rien d'accrocheur.
Le gameplay reste "potable" mais pour la difficulté du jeu...come on !! Je suis une bonne gameuse mais j'avais l'impression de jouer à un jeu qui passe dans "Joueur du Grenier" ! Les interactions entres les plateformes sont AU PIXEL PRÈS (alors imaginez la difficulté lors des courses contre la montre) ! J'ai plus vu l'écran de chargement après ma mort que le jeu ! Et les ennemis sont aléatoires coté difficulté. Certes je sais qu'ils ont des classes plus fortes mais un coup je tue quelqu'un à coté d'eux ils ne voient rien, un coup je me fais insta-kill !
Et est-ce que j'en parle quand des checkpoints te ramènent à un endroit ou tu as une fraction de seconde pour réagir avant de re-mourir dans un effondrement ou dans les flammes ?
Bref, cela enlève absolument tout le plaisir de jouer. 
Mais curieuse comme je suis, j'ai continué et j'ai même joué à celui qui est en Russie. Eh ben sérieux, même en mode normal, il est pire que celui en Inde. Même moi qui est une fan des Assassin's creed, je sens que je me suis bien fait arnaquer !
En conclusion, JE LE DÉCONSEILLE FORTEMENT !

review: ''Chronicles'' serisinin diğer iki oyunu gibi gene eğlenceli bol bol koşmalı biraz da puzzellı ve bazen de sinir bozucu bir oyun olmuş.. Sinir bozucu kısmı ise bazı yerleri gereğinden fazla kasmışlar.. oynarken ağıza alınmayacak küfürler çıkıyorda bazen :))

author: {'steamid': '76561198154997308', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1581219260}
review:
Completely Meh

I RETURNED THIS GAME. This game is fun, looks greats, isn't GPU intensive and the story isn't half bad. The level design can get to you and the combat is satifying for a sidescroller. However, it is basically unplayable with a keyboard and mouse because it wasn't made for that, it was made for a controller. The mechanics aren't broken, they just aren't meant for a keyboard. BUT, then with an xbox or PC controller, they were even worse. So bad that I ended up returning the game. So the game itself: good. Playablility on a PC: basically none.

author: {'steamid': '76561198339159041', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 570, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 570, 'last_played': 1486024183}
review: 美工和音乐都很棒，这都是育碧的拿手好戏，关卡的设计强于俄罗斯那部太多，至于游戏性究竟如何就不评价了，因为这方面表现在横板阵营里并不突出。剧情部分嘛....嘿嘿，育碧又在挖坑了，虽然三部曲里，中国部分填上了《余烬》的坑，俄罗斯部分填上了《陨落》的坑，并对中国部分的盒子进行了故事延伸，但这作的宝石究竟有什么用途？不知育碧什么时候能做出解释。总之，编年史三部曲还是粉丝向的产品，从最早的售卖方式就看的出来，对于AC玩家，我推荐这部作品，如果给三部曲作品排个名，中国第一，印度第二，俄罗斯没排名，因为毛子这部根本不推荐。

author: {'steamid': '76561198059517386', 'num_games_owned': 730, 'num_reviews': 256, 'playtime_forever': 315, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1485322261}
review: Спустя лишь только год после прохождения Assassin's Creed Chronicles: China я прошёл вторую часть трилогии, действие которой происходит в Индии. В плане картинки и интерфейса абсолютно такая же, но в плане геймплея, кажется, стала более разнообразнее. Проходить по-прежнему где-то легко, а где-то сложно и даже очень. Не обошлось без стереотипов про Индию. Рекомендую взять, если вам понравилась глава про Китай:)

author: {'steamid': '76561198091666121', 'num_games_owned': 711, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 476, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1483940964}
review:
I think the best way to review this game is to compare it to ACC: China, the first in the series. The story continues on from China, as Arbaaz searchs for Ezio's box. 

[u]Better[/u]
-Enviroment, the Indian art style is simply beautiful and colorful, matches the tone of India very well
-Voice Acting, the voices made more sense
-More type of gameplay, but not really (sniping)
-Difficulty, harder than China, but still fun
-Arbaaz is a more interesting character, and the story is better. Arbaaz cares more about his girlfriend than trying to stop evil lol

[u]Not so much better[/u]
-Similar types of levels (running level is pratically the same in China, with elephants as the only difference)
-Skills and weapons are the same, I expected a new kinds of weapons since India is a few hundred years into the future?

Final say: If you liked China, you will like India, but don't play them close together, it will feel very repetitive :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197970198884', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 492, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 492, 'last_played': 1483900454}
review: Obwohl ich nicht zu den Geduldigsten gehöre, muss ich sagen,dass AC India ein sehr gutes 2,5D Plattform-stealth-Spiel ist. Man muss die richtigen Momente abpassen oder seine gadgets sinnvoll einsetzen. Klar besser als der erste Teil (China) und auch nicht allzu schwer,obwohl das hier oft behauptet wird.
