author: {'steamid': '76561197975616138', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 220, 'last_played': 1466733443}
review:
It's so weird reading all the negative comments on here, which are undeserved. Yes, the game requires patience, timing, and skill to master, like all AC games. You probably won't be awesome the first time you play. But if you enjoyed AC China, AC India is an improvent over the first. The better you get, the more the levels flow nicely. The levels are huge, and evocative of the classic Prince of Persia game (which REALLY had infamously difficult controls).

The new protagonist has more combat options and a different set of equipment. The game takes full advantage of all the rich colors and patterns that makes the historical culture of India one of the treasures of the world.

If you are an Assassins Creed Fan, there's no reason why you should not have a blast playing all the AC Chronicles games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140229093', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 464, 'last_played': 1452804977}
review:
If you like keyboard-smashing frustration, go ahead and play this game. And I say this as an Assassin's Creed fan who has played every game available on PC.

Okay, that was harsh, I typed that not long after smashing my keyboard and my hands were still hurt. Now that I've calmed down, let me edit and clarify why I don't like this game:

On the one hand, it has beautiful visual (as all AC games do), and I've found Arbaaz Mir to be an interesting character from the comic. I really wanted to like it. But the game disappoints. After the first sequence, I was greeted with Arbaaz and Pyara Kaur's cringeworthy dialogue. (It's not creepy or anything. It's just that I can really imagine Henry Green facepalming at his dad's jokes.) But that's okay. Maybe I no longer found the character charismatic, but the game could still have something else to offer. So I continued.

I desynched more in this game than I have in any other AC game. It crossed from 'challenging' to 'frustrating' in a few sequences. Every tiny second of mistake or deviation will make you desynch. There's little room for different play styles. I'm a Brawler in these games, but this one no longer has that category, unfortunately. (It's replaced by Silencer, where you take out guards in a non-lethal way, which is a lot like Assassin style but more time-consuming.) This results in lower points and fewer abilities rewarded, which makes the game even more frustrating.

Unlike China, which offers solid backstory (in the database) to a little-known character, India offers little for the character of Arbaaz. I was at sequence 7 and collected database entries, yet I didn't feel like I know much more about him. So there really wasn't much for me to continue.

I'm aware that my review is highly subjective, and that there are people who enjoy it, people with more patient and less desire to deviate than me. Still, I cannot give a thumb up for this one, due to how frustrated I feel with it. This is the first AC game I can't bring myself to finish, and I've played most of them.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074995701', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 518, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 518, 'last_played': 1452786696}
review:
조작감이 익숙하지 않은 건지 아직 버그가 많은 건지 말도 안되는 게임오버가 너무 많습니다.  
그리고 재시작 시 그래픽이 버벅대는 버그도 있고 건물에 깔렸는데도 살아나는 버그도 존재합니다. 

게임 구성은 많이 복잡해졌습니다. 그에 비해 스토리는 당연히도 단순합니다.

일반 미션의 경우, 적에게 변칙적인 움직임은 없으므로 게임오버를 많이 보다보면 클리어가 자동으로 되는 타입입니다.

그러나 시간 제한이 있는 미션은 꽤 많은 게임오버를 보지 않을까 합니다.
게다가 시간에 쫒기는 미션이 생각보다 많습니다. 

개인적으로는 다시 하고 싶지 않으나 게임 자체는 말끔하게 나왔으므로 추천합니다.

차이나를 한 번 겪어봐서 플레이타임은 꽤 줄어들었습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104406932', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1052, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 726, 'last_played': 1482765309}
review:
本作主线剧情承接刺客信条编年史中国篇的内容，比之前的中国篇按键操作更加合理，尤其是格挡键终于设置的顺手了。去除了中国篇令人蛋疼的斗士任务风格，将其改为了击晕的无声者和杀死敌人的刺客风格，毕竟不是每个人都能超级加强版全程正面1血无双的。场景画面凸显印度特色，主题曲依然是Ezio‘s famliy的变奏版。要不是这UPLAY的日常网络问题，作为一款外传作品就很不错了。
       最后吐槽一下这印度人不愧是开挂的民族，HELIX特技都比Shao Yun高大上不少，跟印度电影一样跳着舞蹈都能杀死敌人。

author: {'steamid': '76561198194945050', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 171, 'playtime_forever': 661, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 661, 'last_played': 1452747803}
review:
나쁘지 않다. 
어쌔신크리드의 페르시아왕자버전이라 생각하면 이해가 빠를것이다.
다만 내가 플레이하면서 이렇게 많은 투정을 부린것 손안에 들정도다.
레프트쉬프트와레프트콘트롤그리고 C키등을 동시에 쓴다던지 하는 콘트롤에 대한 압박이 심하고, 
새끼손가락이 나중에는 쥐가 날 정도이다. 
물론 이런 퍼즐액션은 노가다가 많고, 반복되는 경향이 있는데... 이번엔 정도가 심할정도이다. 
난이도가 좀 높은편이므로 차이나 버전을 경험하지 못한분들은 어느정도 초반에 애를 먹을것이다.

review: Série Chronicles je 2,5D řada již vyšla China a včera 12,1 2016 i India. Tato hra nemá moc dobré grafické spracování ale co strácí detaily nahrazuje logika kterou často musíte používat. author: {'steamid': '76561198055541101', 'num_games_owned': 674, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 698, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 574, 'last_played': 1471961219}
review:
Okay, let's begin with some basic stuff. You can only say that you think this game is good or bad. You can also compare it to China, but that's all. You cannot compare it to other Assassin's Creed games, like Unity. It's a different type of game, 2.5D, so there is no meanful comparison to first person ACs.

Now, if you liked China, you'll definitely like this one (unless you only like female assassins). I can see improvement to many areas: artwork is even more outstanding, graphics look better as well as the colours, cities feel more alive and the whole environment gives more options and space to discover. There is also a map. In addition, you can now change control buttons (huge problem with China). As for the rest, story is good, creativity is needed, movement in depth looks amazing.

Let's now pass to the things they did not improve (and maybe there is no reason to). Gameplay is much about the same. I had found China ridiculously difficult, having a hard time once I had to battle. Same thing here. Controls may be editable now, but the amount of enemies coming when the alarm starts, their high reaction speed, in combination with the extremely low level of life you are given, makes it a nightmare to win a battle (even in normal) and averts you from starting it (even by accident). But, maybe that's the point. Because now you can take advantage of all these assassins' skills that have been forgotten since Altair and Ezio. Hidding, eagle vision, smokes, whistling, stealth kills and many more. That's what this game exhorts you to do. And I believe they have done a great job on that. Movement is smooth and gives many potentials. Of course there are certain things to get fixed, but we have to understand that these two ACs require a different approach and much more patience, counterbalancing the shorter content. 

Overall, Assassin’s Creed® Chronicles: India offers a pretty enjoyable experience at a very low price. The game is very well developed and gives an interesting perspective to the AC family. So, use the tools you have been given, climb some walls, save valuable items and people, hide at any possible place, kill without getting spotted, and avoid combat by any cost. Have fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561197975174907', 'num_games_owned': 641, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1452758184}
review:
Well ,first off its not a bad game. I will explain the reason for my downvote. It just something which bothers me if anyone else is fine with it then they shouldn't hesitate in giving it a try.

[h1]Pros:[/h1]

[b]Good Artstyle :[/b]
They have accurately displayed Indian culture more than most of the games out there. 

[b]Localised Voice:[/b] 
Its a small touch but the guards talking in Punjabi adds to the feel of it.

[b]Graphics :[/b]
Well there aren't a lot of graphical setings which we are used to see on a PC title. I think for a game like this its enough.

[b]Gameplay:[/b]
Its pretty much the same as Chronicles of China so if you enjoyed the sneaking around and platforming in that one, then you will like this one too. Although it will fall short to platformers like Strider and Mark of the Ninja. 

[h1]Cons:[/h1]

[b]Controls:[/b] 
Personally this is the only con which i feel, the controls feel clunky not as fast as you want them to be. 

[b]No Controller support:[/b] 
Again China had controller support so i dont know why this one is keyboard and mouse only , hopefully they will add that in a future update.  Becasue of the clunky controls it really feels weird and uncomfortable to play with. Hence I am downvoting this. If they fix the controls then will edit the review.

[h1]Edit:[/h1]

So they patched the controller support. So its working fine now. the controls are still cluncky, but one can get used to it. Again Chroncles series isnt like a niche AC game. Its more of stealth platformer. So if you are patient and plan you moves then its not a bad buy.


Hope this helped you .

author: {'steamid': '76561198005956944', 'num_games_owned': 2878, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 345, 'last_played': 1492693730}
review:
[h1] Oyunun Türkçe Gameplay Videosu ve İlk Bölümü (60 FPS):	[/h1]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nN7PeIzylXc
[h1] Oyun Hakkında[/h1]
Çokça Assassin's Creed oyunu çıkmasının da etkisiyle oyuna karşı oldukça önyargılı yaklaştım. Biliyorsunuz Chronicles olarak 3 Assassin's Creed oyunu çıkacaktı, Bunlardan 2'si Çin ve Bu oyun Hindistan çıktı, Rusya bölümü ise Şubat ayında çıkacak. Chronicles serisi alıştığımız Assassin's Creed oyunlarından farklı olarak 2.5 D boyutlu ve platform oyunu şeklinde. Öncelikle bu oyuna bakarken ne ile karşılaşacağınızı iyi bilmekte fayda var.

Eğer klasik bir Assassin's Creed oyunu beklentisindeyseniz pek tabi ki Assassin's Creed Chronicles: India beklentinizi karşılamayacak. Normal seriden çok farklı bir seri Chronicles serisi. Bu nedenle bu oyunu değerlendirirken kendi içinde ve sunduğu/vaat ettiği şeylere bakmakta fayda var.

[h1] Bu Chronicles Serisi de Neyin Nesi?[/h1]
Chronicles serisi Assassin's Creed evreninde hikayeler arası tam bir katalizör görevi görmüyor ama hikayeleri bağlamakta veya hikayelerin genişlemesinde rolü olduğu da kuşkusuz. Oyunun ve Chronicles serisinin ilk yanı bu. Assassin's Creed Dünyasına ait bir hikaye, önceki oyunlarla bağlantılı küçük bilgiler vs. gibi. Bu oyunda Dünya genelindeki Assassin's Brotherhood'una mensup Hintli bir Assassini oynuyoruz.

[h1] Oynanış: [/h1]
Oyun 2.5 boyutlu bir platform oyunu. Eski tabirle "yandan bakmalı" oyun diyebileceğimiz türden. Karakterimizi görünmeyen düz bir çizgide kontrol edebiliyoruz ancak. O çizginin üstüne altına çıkabiliyoruz ama yanına geçemiyoruz. Bu da tabi platform oyunlarının en büyük handikapı. Oyun size bir serbestlik tanımıyor hareket konusunda. Gideceğiniz yol, güzergah bu bağlamda belli. Yukarıda dedim ya beklentiye göre değil bu oyunun sunduğuna göre değerlendirme yapılmalı. Bu bir platform oyunu olduğu için bu düz çizgi aslında bir problem değil.

[h1] Mekanikler: [/h1]
Oyunun mekanikleri oldukça hoş, dodgelar, zıplamalar, dövüş mekanikleri oldukça yerinde. Bölümler ilerledikçe, seviyeniz arttıkça yapabileceğiniz hareketlerin, kullanabileceğiniz farklı eşyaların sayısı da artıyor. Bu da doğal olarak oyunu tek düzeylikten çıkarıyor. Fakat temel mekaniklerin iyi olması oldukça önemli. Karakterinizi kontrol ederken bir kütük kontrol etmiyorsunuz, canlılık hissiyatını hissedebiliyorsunuz.

[h1] Grafikler - Atmosfer - Sesler: [/h1]
Ne demiştik, oyunu vaad ettiğine göre değerlendirmeliyiz. Bu bağlamda grafikleri bir platform oyununa göre değerlendirmemiz gerekiyor. Evet harkulade, şahane grafikler yok karşımızda, ama bir platform oyununa göre oldukça yeterli hatta iyi bile sayılır. Karakter ve mekan modellemeleri çok hoş. Mesela Bengay Kaplanları şahane yapılmış oyunda.

Atmosfer bu oyunun en başarılı yanı galiba. Pastel renklerin hakim olduğu 19. YY Hindistan'ı oldukça güzel tasvir edilmiş. Tabi Atmofser'in iyi olmasında mekan-karakter tasfirlerinin, ses kullanımlarının başarısı göz ardı edilmemeli. Hepsi bir araya geldiğinde güzel bir Atmosfer ile karşı karşıyayız.

Oyunun sesleri de oldukça başarılı. Karakterlerin diyalogları olsun, ara geçiş sahnelerindeki sinematik diyebileceğimiz sahneler olsun seslendirmeler çok iyi. Hindistan'da geçtiği için doğal olarak Hint aksanı ile karşı karşıyayız. Hint aksanı da başarılı bir şekilde verilmiş.

[h1] Hikaye [/h1] 
Assassin's Creed serilerinin tamamını oynamadığım için Hikayeye bir bütün olarak bakamıyorum fakat bu oyunun Hikayesi de bir yerden Assassin's Creed evrenini ilgilendiriyor, sürekli olarak bağlantı kurulabilecek noktalar var. Mesela oyunun başında bahsi geçen bir elmas var, bu Elmasın Brootherhood korumasındaki Eden'ların önemli bir parçası olduğu kabul ediliyor. Oyunun kendi içindeki hikayesi de başlangıç olarak yeterli sayılır.

Ama hikaye anlatımı aynı başarıda değil. Size iki cümle okutarak hikayenin içine girmenizi beklemeleri pek gerçekçi değil.

[h1] Genel Değerlendirme - Son Notlar	[/h1]
Bu kadar övmüşssün harika bir oyun mu bu diyenleriniz için, hayır kesinlikle harika bir oyun değil. Sadece basit (Kolay anlamında değil, temel anlamında) ve iyi bir oyun Assassin’s Creed® Chronicles: India. Oyundan ne beklemeniz gerektiğini bilirseniz oyunu sevebilirsiniz. Bu oyun gibi platform oyunları belki aynı kalitede artık mobil cihazlara bile çıkarken bu oyunu "iyi" olarak değerlendirmeyebiliriz, fakat ben de çokça Assassin’s Creed oyun çıkmasından kaynaklanan ve oynarken "bu bir mobil platform" oyunu şeklindeki önyargımı oynadıkça ve keyif aldıkça kırdım.

Tekrar belirtiyorum, bu oyuna fazla anlam yüklerseniz büyük hayalkırıklığı olur, ama ne sunduğunu bilirseniz keyif alacağınız bir oyun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093726039', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 423, 'playtime_forever': 1574, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 718, 'last_played': 1557840089}
review:
진행 방식은 차이나와 비슷하다. 다만 암살이 안 먹히는 상대의 비율이 꽤 되서 힘든 편. 난이도 자체도 중국편보다 높다.

한회차 뛰는데 걸리는 시간은 8시간 정도. 인돈데 뜬금없이 알렉산더 쪽으로 넘어가는 것은 별로.

망토가 360도 스핀하는 버그라던가 몇몇 곳에서 입력이 힘든 등의 문제는 있다. 어쌔신 크리드라기 보단 페르시아의 왕자 시리즈와 더 비슷한 분위기와 게임 플레이 방식을 가지고 있다. 가볍게 즐기기엔 OK.

가장 큰 단점은 왼쪽 손으로 방향키를 누르면서도 왼쪽 shift와 왼쪽 ctrl, 스페이스를 눌러야 한다는 것. 새끼손가락이 힘들다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002550259', 'num_games_owned': 638, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 533, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 521, 'last_played': 1454020798}
review:
I would love to post a positive review, for I was enjoying the game quite a bit. That is, until I reached an impassable bug on the second level, at the hanging weights puzzle. While jumping from the rightmost weight to the leftmost, my jump doesn't clear the gap. After trying it several times, I looked up a video of someone doing it, except their jump goes far enough. I have tried to replicate this at least 50 times but cannot get the jump to reach no matter what combination of button presses I use. 

Was planning on writing a full review and doing a video but cannot experience the full game due to this bug, hopefully it can be fixed and I can change this to a positive review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023409696', 'num_games_owned': 756, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1453586558}
review: a great platformer where you actually need to use all your assassin skills to finish the level, unlike main ac games where you can just slice through everyone. Soundtrack reminds me a bit of AC2 which is obviously a good thing. Wouldn't say it is the most beautiful 2d game i've seen, but the art direction's still great. Controlls are tight, no fps drops, no uplay issues. I'd give it 7.5/10 for now, a decent buy for its price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110909359', 'num_games_owned': 201, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1487901414}
review:
The Second Chapter of the Spinoff Series,Chronicles India is a sequel to China.
It is a 2.5 D platformer and kinda gives a new spin to the series(Hey my Dear Haters,Did you say the series never changes?)
The story follows up after China and Rogue(Cuz now the Templars have the box again!)

The controls are very good but cannot be changed(as far as i saw).There are NO tweaking options as such in the graphics department.(You can just change the resolution-That's it).If You want a better Antialiasing(Beleive me you will need it) Try external sources,like enabling it through Nvidia's control Panel.or maybe use sweetfx.

The gamplay is VERY VERY good.It is a nicely executed platformer.You will definitely get the AC vibe,but this is totaly different.The levels are very well designed and are very imaginative.Those of you who have Played Chronicles China before will find a lot of changes in this one.This time around we dont kill a templar in every sequence,but build up towards one final assassination.Also this one focuses quite a bit on physics based puzzles.

The story is good(Just good,nothing spectacular),The protagonist sound less like a zombie this time around(Shao Yun Definitely sounded like one!).The story is not very long though(of course you have to keep in mind that they are charging Rs 300-or 9 USD-Which is the price of a Standard DLC so......)

Overall it is a great game,Definitely get it-If you have the money!

author: {'steamid': '76561198181998227', 'num_games_owned': 129, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 632, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 540, 'last_played': 1455179925}
review:
Я большой фанат  assassin's creed ! Поиграл во все части и знаю что такое Ассасины...
Я поиграл в эту игру и оказалось что это не провал юбисофт!
Все минусы прошлой части assassin's creed china Они убрали а все плюсы доработали до совершенства!!!
И так плюсы:
+Хороший сюжет!
+Графика давольно забавная и не обычная...
+Интерестный и загадочный герой.
+Геймплей
+Оригинальные головоломки.
Минусы:
-Ну конечно же оптимизация (Это уже нормально...)
-Иногда выскакивают милюсенькие лаги (Но в основном все номально)
Буду ждать следуйщюю часть про Матушку Россию!
Спасибо юбисофт за ежегодную часть Ассасинов :D

author: {'steamid': '76561197970704819', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 337, 'playtime_forever': 411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 290, 'last_played': 1452715372}
review:
[h1]ทุกอย่างเหมือนเดิม ที่เพิ่มเติมคือคำว่า 'India'[/h1]

Assassin’s Creed® Chronicles: India นับเป็นภาคที่ 2 ของซีรีส์ Chronicles และตัวเกมก็ยังคงนำเสนอการเล่นในรูปแบบ Stealth/Action Side Scrolling ไม่แตกต่างอะไรกับภาค China ด้านงานศิลป์ของเกมก็ยังคงโดดเด่นเหมือนเดิม สิ่งแวดล้อมต่างๆ รวมถึงฉากในเกมยังคงสีสันสดใสและมีลักษณะเป็น 2.5D เหมือนกันเป๊ะๆ มีการเล่นกับความตื้นลึกของฉากเหมือนเดิม (ในแนวแกน Z) คุณสามารถโดดเข้าออกตามเสา ประตู หน้าต่าง หรือโหนเชือกไปยังพื้นที่ข้างเคียงได้ในจุดที่เกมกำหนดไว้ และในภาคนี้การเล่นกับสิ่งแวดล้อมที่เกมนำเสนอมีมากขึ้นจนรู้สึกได้ตั้งแต่เริ่มต้น ทำให้การเล่นแบบลอบเร้นเป็นอะไรที่น่าสนใจมากกว่าเดิม เพราะการประชันกับศัตรูซึ่งๆหน้าในภาคนี้ค่อนข้างทำได้ลำบากกว่าภาคก่อนๆด้วย (เพราะจะเจอรุมตายนี่แหละ) 

AI ของเกมแม้จะไม่ได้ฉลาดมากมาย (ภาคก่อนเป็นยังไงก็ยังคงเป็นแบบนั้น) แต่การต่อสู้ในเกมนี้ก็ยังคงเป็นตัวเลือกรองไม่ต่างอะไรกับเกมภาคก่อน คุณต้องอาศัยจังหวะในการออกท่าทางต่างๆ ทั้งการฟัน การหลบหลีก หรือออกท่าสังหารรูปแบบต่างๆ อย่างการสไลด์เข้าฟัน การพลิกตัวอ้อมหลังสังหาร ทุกอย่างต้องพอเหมาะพอดีทั้งหมด การกดปุ่มออกอาวุธรัวๆแบบมั่วซั่วในเกมนี้ไม่ค่อยมีประสิทธิภาพมากนัก เพราะตัวเอกของเราไม่ค่อยจะทนไม้ทนมือซักเท่าไหร่ อีกทั้งศัตรูเกมนี้มีจังหวะในการสวนกลับที่รวดเร็วด้วยครับ แต่ถึงกระนั้นคุณก็จะรู้สึกสนุกกับระบบต่อสู้ของเกม ถ้าคุณสามารถจับจังหวะในการกดได้เมื่อใช้เวลาเล่นไปซักระยะครับ 

ความยากของเกมแบ่งเป็น 3 ระดับ แต่แค่ระดับปกติในตอนเริ่มต้นก็พอจะทำเอาตึงมือสำหรับผู้เล่นมือใหม่แล้วละ การจะปลดล็อกระดับความยากที่สูงขึ้น คุณจำเป็นต้องเล่นเกมให้จบ 1 รอบก่อน (เกมไม่ยาวมาก ราวๆ 6 ชั่วโมงก็จบครับ) ตัวเลือกที่เหลือก็จะปลดล็อกให้ ระบบอัพเกรดตัวละครภายในเกมนี้คิดจากคะแนนที่คุณเล่นได้ในแต่ละฉาก เช่น เล่นแบบไหน!? ลุยดะหรือลอบเร้น? ทำภารกิจย่อยครบมั้ย? เก็บไอเทมพิเศษครบหรือเปล่า? หรือถูกตรวจจับไปกี่ครั้ง!?  เมื่อเล่นจบฉากจะมีการสรุปคะแนนให้ดูว่าถึงเกณท์ที่กำหนดหรือไม่ รางวัลที่ได้สำหรับการอัพเกรดก็มีตั้งแต่ การเพิ่มเลือดตัวละคร การแบ่งศัตรูเคลื่อนที่ได้เร็วขึ้น เพิ่มความเสียหายจากการโจมตี ไปจนถึงการออกท่าสังหารใหม่ๆ ครับ ผมพบว่าระบบอัพเกรดแบบนี้มันไม่ให้อิสระในการเลือกวิธีเล่นเท่าไรนัก เพราะการเล่นแบบลอบเร้นก็ยังคงให้คะแนนที่สูงที่สุดเสมอ ซึ่งถ้าคุณต้องการพัฒนาตัวละครให้ได้มากที่สุดมันก็เหมือนจะบังคับกลายๆว่าคุณต้องเล่นแบบลอบเร้นเป็นหลักครับ

สำหรับคนที่เล่นภาค China มาก่อนแล้ว ถ้าถามผมว่าภาคนี้สนุกมั้ย!? ตอบเลยว่าสนุกเหมือนเดิม แต่ถ้าถามว่ามีอะไรใหม่มั้ย!? อันนี้ค่อนข้างผิดหวังฮะ เพราะเท่าที่เล่นมารูปแบบต่างๆ ทั้งท่าสังหาร ระบบอัพเกรด การใช้สิ่งแวดล้อมในฉาก ทั้งหมดเกือบจะเหมือนเดิมเป๊ะๆ แค่เปลี่ยนธีมจากจีนมาเป็นอินเดียเท่านั้น แต่สำหรับมือใหม่ที่อยากจะลองสัมผัสภาคนี้โดยตรง ก็ถือว่าโอเคนะ ตัวเกมมีคุณค่าในการเล่นซ้ำอยู่ในระดับดีเมื่อเทียบกับค่าตัวแค่ 299 บาท ขาจรถ้าอยากเล่นกดไปก็ไม่เสียหาย แต่สำหรับขาประจำที่เล่น China มาแล้ว ผมว่าคุณรอมันลดราคาซะหน่อยค่อยกดจะโอเคมากๆ ครับ

**Review ภาค China อ่านได้ที่นี่ครับ http://steamcommunity.com/id/ChaosInMotion/recommended/354380/

author: {'steamid': '76561198183021178', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 296, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1456886413}
review: I love the Chronicle games. They are great filler games in between major Assassin's Creed releases. This game plays much like China Chronicles with some added abilities.  It's a good 2.5 platformer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072065020', 'num_games_owned': 693, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 1609, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1455494107}
review: 比起中国多了更多的元素，比如击晕、摸尸体、偷窃等等，战斗方面的手感也有很大提升，主体玩法上并没有太大变化。总的来说延续了小品级游戏的定位，比上一作有提升。

author: {'steamid': '76561198089931009', 'num_games_owned': 971, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 605, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1455745633}
review:
Evet. Yine bir Assassin's Creed. Ben bu serinin incelemesini yazmaktan yoruldum, Ubisoft oyun çıkarmaktan yorulmadı. Yorulmasın zaten. Seviyorum ben bu seriyi (Liberation ve Unity hariç o ikisinin amk.) Neyse. Ubisoft ibnesi daha geçen sene açıklamıştı, 3 tane 2.5d oyun gelecek diye. Ne gerek vardı ? Onu Ubisofta sorun. Zira herifler ya işsiz, yada tefecilere borcu var, bu ney lan yılda 2 oyun çıkarıyolar aynı seriden...

Şimdi ırkçılık yapmak gibi olmasın ama ben ne hintlileri, ne de hindistanı sevmiyorum. Sırf bu saçma önyargımdan dolayı bugüne kadar hiç bir hint filmini ne izledim, ne de izlemek için can attım. Sevmiyorum arkadaş ben bu ülkeyi, çok gereksiz bi ülke. Hali ile bu oyun için de pek bir beklentim yoktu. Alırım bitiririm gider diye yani. Sırf ismi var diye. Sırf AC oyunu diye. Ama ne çile çektirdiniz be Ubisoft... Lan başka ülke mi yoktu ? Bu ney lan ? Bi kere oyunun baş karakterinin ismi Arbaaz... Böyle isim mi olur arkadaş, seri karizmatik Ezio`dan ezik Arbaaz`a U dönüşü yaptı bildiğin. Kemiklerini sikeyim Ubisoft.

Oyunumuz 19cu yüzyılın adı batasıca Hindistanında geçiyor. Oyuna girer girmez dedim, China`da grafik yoktu, bunda da olmaz herhalde. Yanıldım mı ? Ah keşke... Bi kere 2.5d oyundan grafik beklemek aptallık. Neyse ki beklentilerim düşüktü. Oyun bildiğiniz Prince of Persia çakması lan. Neyse geçelim senaryoya. İdare eder. İşte bir Arbaaz yine hedef buluyo, öldürüyo falan. Şaşırmadınız dimi ? Assassin`s Creed lan bu ne bekliyodunuz ? Geçin senaryoyu. Atmosfer... Güzel. Ben bi oyunda senaryodan sonra atmosfere önem veririm. Allahtan Ubisoft hep mekan tasarımlarında iyi iş çıkaran bir firma, bu oyunda da döktürmüş. Beğendim... Ve geçmişe gittim bir anlık. Prince of Persia zamanlarını hatırlattı bana. Ah ulan Ah.

Fizik ve detaylar birebir China`ın aynısı. Taktiksel ilerliyosun, koşuyosun, zıplıyosun, öldürüyosun. Güzel bence ya, 2.5d oyun sonuçta. Strateji ve taktiksel ilerlemek yakışıyo Chronicles serisine. Ha geliştirmedikleri için amına koyim ben bu şirketin orası ayrı, ama şükretmek gerek. Seslendirmeye gelirsekte pek konuşacak birşey yok, bilen bilir Ubisoftu, China oyununda ezioyu boktan birine seslendirmiş şirket bu, cebinden para harcayıp Ezio`yu seslendiren eski şahısı (Roger craig Smith) getirse batacak sanki amına koduğumun şirketi ama yok para dedin mi akla bir EA, iki Ubisoft gelir. Öyle yani.

Şimdi bu incelemeyi daha da uzatırım fakat ne buna feda edecek zamanım var, ne de bu oyun değiyor. Ortalama bir oyun işte. Beklentilerimi Chronicles: Russia için saklıyorum cyka blat görmek için sabırsızlanıyorum, fakat dediğim gibi İndia`ya gelecek olursak: ortalama bir yapım.
